alert.note: Alert for Sheep Range; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 05 at 3:14AM PST until January 06 at 4:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST FRIDAY ABOVE 6000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected above 6000 feet. Total snow accumulations of up to 6 inches below 7000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 15 inches above 7000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Sheep Range and Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Chain restrictions or road closures may result as heavy snowfall accumulates on high roadways above 6000 feet. Wind gusts and heavy snowfall could result in reduced visibility.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions will make travel very hazardous or impossible. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Sheep Range; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon
